content: The best way to access the remote beaches of the Algarve coast in Portugal is by renting a car or using a taxi service. Some of the beaches are located off the beaten path and may require a bit of a hike to reach them. However, a car rental or taxi service will make it easier to explore multiple beaches and access some of the more secluded areas along the coast. There are also some boat tours that offer access to some of the more isolated beaches.
